statements: SELECT * FROM StockExpiryDates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name FROM StockExpiryDates WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name FROM StockExpiryDates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT expiration_date FROM StockExpiryDates WHERE id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_expired FROM StockExpiryDates WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM StockExpiryDates ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM StockExpiryDates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, product_name, expiration_date FROM StockExpiryDates WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM StockExpiryDates ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM StockExpiryDates WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date
SELECT * FROM stock ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock WHERE expiry_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM stock WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM stock ORDER BY quantity ASC, expiry_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM stock JOIN expiry_notifications ON stock.id = expiry_notifications.product_id WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stock WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock WHERE expiry_date < CURDATE();
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM stock WHERE quantity < 10 AND expiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';

SELECT * FROM stock JOIN expiry_notifications ON stock.id = expiry_notifications.product_id WHERE stock.quantity >= 5 AND expiry_notifications.notification_type = 'Email' ORDER BY stock.quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM stock WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StockProduct;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM StockProduct WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM StockProduct ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ExpiryAlert WHERE alert_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM StockLocation ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockProduct
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM StockProduct ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT SP.product_name, SL.location_name FROM StockProduct SP INNER JOIN StockLocation SL ON SP.product_id = SL.location_id
SELECT SP.product_name, EA.alert_date FROM StockProduct SP INNER JOIN ExpiryAlert EA ON SP.product_id = EA.product_id
SELECT SL.location_name, SP.quantity FROM StockLocation SL INNER JOIN StockProduct SP ON SL.location_id = SP.product_id ORDER BY SP.quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM StockItems;
SELECT name, quantity FROM StockItems WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, quantity, expiry_date FROM StockItems WHERE expiry_date >= CURDATE();
SELECT alert_date, alert_message FROM ExpiryAlerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT stock_item_id, wastage_reason FROM WastageLog WHERE wastage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM StockItems ORDER BY name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT name, quantity FROM StockItems WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT name, expiry_date FROM StockItems WHERE expiry_date < '2022-12-31'

SELECT StockItems.name, ExpiryAlerts.alert_date, AlertsHistory.resolved FROM StockItems JOIN ExpiryAlerts ON StockItems.id = ExpiryAlerts.stock_item_id JOIN AlertsHistory ON ExpiryAlerts.alert_id = AlertsHistory.alert_id
SELECT name, quantity, expiry_date FROM StockItems WHERE quantity < 50 AND expiry_date > '2023-06-30' ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM stock_items
SELECT item_name, expiry_date FROM stock_items
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM stock_locations
SELECT item_id, location_id, quantity FROM stock_quantity WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT notification_id, notification_msg FROM stock_notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC
SELECT item_name, expiry_date FROM stock_items
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM stock_locations
SELECT item_id, location_id, quantity FROM stock_quantity ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_id, notification_msg, notification_date FROM stock_notifications WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT item_id, action, audit_timestamp FROM stock_audit_log ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC
